alert.note: Alert for Harding; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 4:41PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Harding and west central Perkins Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 441 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Ralph, or 18 miles east of Buffalo, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Harding and west central Perkins Counties to the north of Reva and south of Ralph. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
